name: My Last Day at the Thought Police Hotline (Demo)
name_original: My Last Day at the Thought Police Hotline (Demo)
description: This kinetic visual novel explores the grey area between privacy and security. It follows John, one of the best employees at the Thought Police Hotline, and his last day there. There is no romance in this visual novel.  This is currently the beta of the demo. This is the Windows version.
